page.title: 05Broomhill,Allerton
page.content: The main land cover is residential flats and houses.There is a good bus service with a total of{13}bus stops. There is a social services centre.The following amenities are available to the people who live there: {1}public phone box {2}post boxes {2}shopping squares and a post office {1}labour club {1}public house {1}hairdressers salon {2}farms {3}schools {1}Bingo, at the church hall {1}community centre These are a few of the amenities not available to the people: DHSS Benefit office and a Job Centre; no hospital or dental surgeries.
